nodes.title: New API interface for custom transfer logic to run when + button is pressed
Banish the access transformers back to the hell they came from
Add support for Version Checker ( 1.8 or 1.8.8 )
Only close item overlay when the GUI is actually closed
add maven upload support, source & javadocs jars for developers
Added separate overlay draw call to IRecipeLayoutDrawable
Added seperate overlay draw call to IRecipeLayoutDrawable
Add the ability to configure the sort order and to use inventory tweaks
Added a safety check for BasicRecipeTransferInfo
Made unique identifiers care more about wildcard metadata
[API] Add methods to add & remove smelting and anvil recipes during runtime
Adds search filter for resource ids, Implements #202
Implements #200, use of page up and page down to scroll pages
[1.10] Add a way to add ItemStacks to JEI during runtime (cherry-pick)
Fix cursor held item and player inventory craft items desyncing when opening RecipesGui
Fix edge case of fluid containers with subtypes being mashed together
Dosen't show all mod recipes like Extended Workbench Mod
RU: Added "Mod Name Format, Control Keys, Smelt Count,..."
Allow configuration of mod name tooltip
Fix texture bug in new tabs

Changed the mod ID to lowercase

Add another example usage link to ReadMe

Fix for items with both empty and some nbt
French translation file for the mod

Update to the new registry system
Prevent localized caches from becoming out of date
fix: Received status code 501 from server: HTTPS Required

Potential fix for #1558 and feature proposal

Fix #1202 by changing enchantments to ingredients

Update ru_ru.lang (Fixing typo in one word)
Boolean to ignore set restriction when transferring recipe items.

Fix line rendering for ghost ingredients

Transition various string based APIs over to text components
